feedback.content: We want to develop Competency Path to better meet your specific needs. Give us your feedback to support our development work.

more-info.description: Below you will find general and up-to-date information about the service.

opinfi.text-1: <CustomLink>Opin.fi<Icon></Icon></CustomLink> is a service that brings together the open courses offered by Finnish universities and universities of applied sciences in one place.
opinfi.text-2: Opin.fi is aimed at everyone who wants to develop their skills - looking for supplementary education and new skills or getting acquainted with higher education studies.

opintopolku.text-1: <CustomLink>Studyinfo<Icon></Icon></CustomLink> provides comprehensive information on education opportunities and application services for different levels of education.
opintopolku.text-2: Once you have found an interesting education opportunity in Competency Path, you can go to Studyinfo to learn more and apply for training. When you log in to your competence profile in My Competency Path, you can import your education history from Studyinfo.

tyomarkkinatori.text-1: <CustomLink>Job Market<Icon></Icon></CustomLink> brings together vacancies and provides support in job search and career planning.
tyomarkkinatori.text-2: Once you have found an interesting job opportunity in Competency Path, you can go to Job Market to explore and apply for vacancies. You can also transfer your information between your My Competency Path competence profile and Job Market job search profile.

you.text-1: Competency Path, Studyinfo, Job Market and Opin.fi form a service package that supports learning, career planning and job search in different life situations. Each service has its own role, but together they provide you with a clear path for your competence and career development.
you.text-2: If you are looking for a direction or your own path, Competency Path allows you to identify your strengths and interests and find suitable training and career opportunities. Once you have found out how you want to proceed, Studyinfo, Job Market and Opin.fi will help you to apply for them.
you.title: How does Competency Path help you as part of other services?

hero.content: Map out your interests and competence. Use them to find options that suit you. Competency Path supports you in finding a direction for your skills and passions. It may open your eyes to unexpected possibilities.
hero.title: Competency Path - find your own direction

ohjaus.content: Use the materials in your guidance work. Find tools that you can use in guidance situations or give the guidance recipient to do independently.
ohjaus.title: Tools for guidance work

tietopalvelu.content: Explore the overview of the contents of the information service. You can filter the list by keywords and navigate to the information content that interests you.
tietopalvelu.title: Up-to-date information to support decision-making

palvelut.title: Didn't find what you were looking for?

tool.content: Tell us what you know and what you are interested in and select the competencies that match them. Find suitable education and employment opportunities based on them.
tool.title: Quickly find suitable opportunities

personal-guidance.content: The services found under guidance and counselling services help you consider your work and education options. Narrow the list of services based on themes that interest you and, for example, where you live to find the most suitable services for you.
personal-guidance.link-text: Go to Guidance and counseling services
personal-guidance.title: Do you need personal guidance?

ohjaaja.content: In the guidance practitioner section, you will find up-to-date high-quality information and methods as well as materials to strengthen your own guidance competence.
ohjaaja.title: Guidance practitioner section

osaamispolku.content: Map out your interests and competencies, and find study or career opportunities By logging in to My Competency Path, you can create your own competence profile and save your information for later use.
osaamispolku.title: My Competency Path

tietopalvelu.content: The information service compiles information related to education, the labour market and competence to support decision-making. You can view the data sets that interest you from different perspectives using different filters.
tietopalvelu.title: Information service

welcome.content: Competency Path service has been launched. The service is continuously developed based on user feedback. Features may change and new functionalities will be added regularly â€“ thank you for being part of the journey!
welcome.title: Welcome to Competency Path!

no-match.description: The page you are looking for could not be found or the link is outdated. Please check the address, open the menu, or go to the homepage.
no-match.title: Oops! Page not found

chatbot.description: In the Competence Path service, the search terms and phrases entered by the user are stored in the conversation history of the Advisory Bot. Users of the Advisory Bot's administration interface and service administrators can view the Advisory Bot's conversation history by logging into the administration interface with two-factor authentication. No personal data is stored in the conversations, as the application masks personal data using a masking algorithm. The masking algorithm recognizes standardized and technically modelable personal data. Users of the service should not enter their personal data into the Competence Path Advisory Bot. Users are informed of this in the greeting text of the Advisory Bot. Conversations are stored in the system for a maximum of 24 months or for the duration of the service agreement.
chatbot.title: Competence Path advisory bot
